Class JComplexField

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.JSchemaItem
io.permazen.JField
io.permazen.JComplexField
Direct Known Subclasses:
JCollectionField, JMapField
public abstract class JComplexField extends JField
Represents a complex field in a JClass.
